snippet.title: Solaria (VS MAXX 50 in 1 system)
snippet.description:
This is 4 stages space shooter from 50in1 VS MAXX "plug into TV" system.
the system is basically a boomerang shapes joypad with AV cable(it runs with 3 AA batteries.)

out of 50 crappy games, this one is the most playable and complete (4 stages) game.
it even has ending scene.

it plays like some kind of Dezaemon sample demo.
Boss BGM is funny too.
